1. "Taken" - This action-packed film stars Liam Neeson as a former special forces operative who is hired by a wealthy businessman (Benicio Del Toro) to find the missing daughter of his client. With its fast-paced action and intense suspense, "Taken" is sure to satisfy fans of action movies.

2. "Why Did I Get Married?" - This romantic comedy stars Kristen Davis as a single woman whose life is turned upside when she meets her childhood best friend (Dwayne Johnson) who is now married to someone else. With its funny romantic moments and heartwarming story, "Why Did I Get Married?" is sure to satisfy fans of romantic comedies.

3. "Journey 2: The Mysterious Island" - This science fiction film stars Josh Hutcherson as a young boy named Sam who lives in an imaginary world called Neverland which is ruled over by a mysterious girl named Mary (played by Dakota Fanning)) who has come to Neverland with the goal of killing Sam so that she can be free and never have to worry about getting into trouble ever again. With its exciting action sequences and heart-pumping suspense, "Journey 2: The Mysterious Island" is sure to satisfy fans of science fiction action movies.

4. "Due Date" - This comedy film stars Danny McBride as a high-strung father-to-be named Peter Highman who lives in a small town in Texas with his wife (played by Juliette Lewis)) and their young daughter (played by Tyler Graham)). When Peter's daughter is due to be born, Peter becomes increasingly anxious and nervous about the birth of his daughter. With its funny and heartwarming moments, "Due Date" is sure to satisfy fans of comedy movies.

Overall, these movie recommendations are sure to satisfy fans of action movies, romantic comedies, science fiction action movies, and comedy movies.
